mapper.select:
select a.id id, a.category_id categoryId, a.name name, a.value value, a.type type, a.size size, a.description description, a.sort sort, a.create_time, a.modify_time from ext_field a
and a.name like concat('%',#{params.name},'%')
and a.category_id in ( select id from category where find_in_set(id,get_category_tree(#{params.categoryId})) )
order by a.sort
mapper.update: alter table content_ext add column ${name} varchar(${size})
